org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode

Class RobotDrive

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.RobotDrive

  • public class RobotDrive
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by christopher.johnson on 10/30/16. Easy robot config!

    By using object-oriented programming, we can easily create a robot drivetrain system by instantiating this class
